name: Targeted
storyline:
The trial of the mafia boss is finally beginning, an event the entire city has been holding its breath for.

The secret police, with the help of foreign agents, uncovered the cartel network, as the local authorities were unable to take action against the gangster network due to high-level corruption.

According to anonymous sources, the success of the trial hinges on the appearance of a key witness whose incriminating testimony could put the mafia boss known as Don K. behind bars for life.

According to our information, the key witness is departing from a highly secured, secret location to the court, as their life is in constant danger. How far does Don K.'s reach extend? Will the key witness survive being targeted by the entire city's gangster network?
summary:
Targetted is another variation on the recently popular anomaly seeker (I'm on Observation Duty) and endless loop games (Exit 8), where you have to survive 10 full days as a key witness to a mafia leader.

The gameplay is simple, if you find anything strange or tampering in the underground car park, you must immediately rush to the lift and escape. If all is well, we can then get in our car to get to the meeting of the day. If our decision proves to be wrong, the gangsters will pounce on us and we can start the game all over again.
